name: citrusui.me
description: The clean and simple website of Avery Magnotti.

scripts.dev: export JEKYLL_ENV=development && bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.ipfs: (ipfs daemon &) && while ! nc -z localhost 5001; do sleep 1; done && export IPFS_HASH=`ipfs add -r _site | sed '$!d; s/^.\{6\}//g; s/.\{6\}$//'` && ipfs add -r _site && ipfs name publish $IPFS_HASH && export IPFS_PEERID=`ipfs id -f=\<id\>` && ipfs name resolve $IPFS_PEERID
scripts.publish: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run prod && npm run ipfs && firebase deploy

author: Avery Magnotti <averymagnotti@outlook.com>
